attributes.action: Introduce free prescriptions for people with Parkinsons disease and related illnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many different types of medications can be needed for this illness. It can be very expensive !

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Parkinsons/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
